mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN teamPosition = 'TOP' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS top_rate, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN teamPosition = 'JUNGLE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS jug_rate, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN teamPosition = 'MIDDLE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS mid_rate, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN teamPosition = 'BOTTOM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS bot_rate, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN teamPosition = 'UTILITY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) * 100, 2) AS sup_rate FROM rune WHERE championName = #{championNamee} AND tier1='에메랄드';
SELECT * FROM rune WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='에메랄드' ORDER BY rune_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM skill3lv1 WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='에메랄드' ORDER BY skill_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM skill6lv1 WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='에메랄드' ORDER BY skill_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM core3 WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='그랜드마스터' ORDER BY core3_count DESC

SELECT * FROM counter WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='마스터' HAVING counter_win_rate != 100 AND counter_win_rate != 0 AND counter_win_rate > 50 ORDER BY counter_win_rate DESC

SELECT * FROM counter WHERE championName=#{championName} AND teamPosition=#{highest_pick_rate_position} AND tier1='마스터' HAVING counter_win_rate != 100 AND counter_win_rate != 0 AND counter_win_rate < 50 ORDER BY counter_win_rate
select championName, championName_kr, highest_pick_rate_position from champList_emerald where line like #{line} order by championName_kr
SELECT championName, championName_kr, highest_pick_rate_position, winrate, pickrate, banrate from champList_emerald where line like #{line} ORDER BY winrate DESC
